name: THE RID
description:
Eliminate the wicked! Feature-length near-future SFRPG

■ Play time

About 15-20 hours

■ Game introduction text

In order to maintain peace and order in this world, secretly
Behind the Scenes Organization "Back United Nations"

Three members of the elimination team "YO_MI", which was established in a branch of an island country in the Far East,
Using weapons permitted only to those belonging to the U.N.
Today as well, we will challenge the world's "troublesome things"...

A near-future sci-fi RPG with 6 missions.
Hard rock rock with a bit of a Japanese (?) atmosphere
I hope you enjoy it.

  • This work contains expressions of violence and bloodshed in some parts. Please be careful if you are not good at it.
